info.name: CivicData Kenya Facilities API v1
info.description:
# CivicData Kenya Facilities API

A RESTful API for accessing public facility data across Kenya. This collection provides mock endpoints for healthcare facilities, educational institutions, and social service centers.

## Base URL
`https://api.civicdata.go.ke/v1`

## Authentication
Public endpoints - no authentication required for read access.

## Versioning
API version is included in the URL path (`/v1/`). Breaking changes will increment the version number.

## Rate Limiting
- Public access: 100 requests/minute
- Partner access: 1000 requests/minute (requires API key)

query.description: Filter by county (e.g., nairobi, mombasa, kisumu, nakuru)
Filter by facility type (health, education, social_services)
Number of results per page (default: 100, max: 500)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of facilities with optional filtering by region and category.

response.name: List Facilities - Success
List Facilities - Filtered by Region

request.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific facility by its ID.

response.name: Get Facility - Success

  "id": "FAC-101",
